title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body:
Dear Riot,
          I keep getting the same message when I try to login and it says, "Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status here. If it looks good, 
follow the guide here." I followed the guide, but it didn't help, and the server status was fine too! I tried League on the other computer and it worked fine, so I have no idea what's going on. I tried the "Run as administrator" button, but that didn't work either... This started happening around the new client 
update, so I tried using the Legacy Client. But whenever I tried using the Legacy Client OR the new client, it would start patching and would get to 99% and then an error would occur and it repeated itself over and over again. So I tried reinstalling the game but I still kept getting the "Unable to connect to login queue" message over and over again, but it at least let me patch. So I tried the Initiate Full Repair button but that didn't help either! HELP ME I JUST WANT TO PLAY THE GAME
EDIT: The YouTube sign in button also broke around the same time League did. It always says "There was an issue signing you into YouTube. Troubleshoot here." I'm hoping if I can fix the YouTube issue the League issue will also fix. Any ideas?

replies.body: It sounds like your client is having a hard time getting a solid connection with our login servers for some reason. You mentioned going through a guide, but let's make sure you double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well. There might just be a setting somewhere that needs to be updating in order to get you through to our servers.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yNlwyMsu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-22T02:11:55.662+0000)
>
> It sounds like your client is having a hard time getting a solid connection with our login servers for some reason. You mentioned going through a guide, but let's make sure you double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well. There might just be a setting somewhere that needs to be updating in order to get you through to our servers.

Thank you! All that stuff looks really scary and I don't want to blow something up, so I'm going to try the Hextech Repair Tool first. Do you think that will work?
It's a good first step, but if that doesn't work definitely hit me back up!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yNlwyMsu,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-23T01:35:31.044+0000)
>
> It's a good first step, but if that doesn't work definitely hit me back up!

It didn't work :(

Aaaaaand they didnt respond. Same thing happend to me i contacted riot support i should apperently send some information stuff. I did that aaaaand they didnt respond. Im sitting here super angry that riot cant fix there game and i cant play it.

Reinstall league and there should be a folder titled "Riot Games" open it and there should be a file name something like lol.exe delete it and then there should be another one that I think is named lol.admin.exe it has the word admin in it or something like that, click run as administrator and it should work, this same thing happened to me and that's what I did Good luck
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Yummy brAKALI,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yNlwyMsu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-05-27T23:07:46.612+0000)
>
> Reinstall league and there should be a folder titled "Riot Games" open it and there should be a file name something like lol.exe delete it and then there should be another one that I think is named lol.admin.exe it has the word admin in it or something like that, click run as administrator and it should work, this same thing happened to me and that's what I did Good luck
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

THANK YOU I WILL TRY THAT
